Integration Costs

Unlock Your Data

Event-Driven Data Easy

Imagine The Possible

Is the cost of integration too high?

Integrating new tools, systems, processes, partners and businesses is part of the journey for any successful company.

The speed at which companies can integrate new tools, systems, processes, partners, and businesses is a key differentiator in competing in today's highly connected world.

Therefore, to achieve true digital transformation it requires agility in systems integration.

  • decentralizing integration - empowering your developers.
  • real-time data is available to discover and self-serve in the form of event-driven APIs.
  • data pushed to API consumers instead of pulled (such as with REST APIs).

“Integration has traditionally been delivered by a centralized integration team following the factory model. This centralized integration (or factory delivery) model cannot keep pace with the ever-increasing and changing demands of integration.”

Gartner,Ensure Your Integration Strategy Supports Modern Integration Trends

Unlock your data

Discoverable, self-service, event-driven, real-time APIs are essential for cutting down the cost and time to integrate.

  • decentralizing integration - empowering your developers.
  • real-time data is available to discover and self-serve in the form of event-driven APIs.
  • data pushed to API consumers instead of pulled (such as with REST APIs).

Make integration business cases more viable with reduced costs and effort.

Event-driven data made easy

Webhookie’s Event Hub turns your business events into real-time, event-driven APIs that will provide your company with the agility it needs to compete in today’s fast-paced connected world by:

  • Cutting integration lead times and their cost
  • Empowering developers by making real-time event-driven data accessible and self-service

Make integration business cases more viable with reduced costs and effort.
